classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

id.description: The id attribute of the item. If not provided, it will be generated.

itemId.description: The id of the item. Must be unique.

onBlur.description: Callback fired when the item root is blurred.

onFocus.description: This prop isn't supported. Use the onItemFocus callback on the tree if you need to monitor an item's focus.

onKeyDown.description: Callback fired when a key is pressed on the keyboard and the tree is in focus.

slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.

editable.nodeName: the content of the items that are editable

slotDescriptions.checkbox: The component that renders the item checkbox for selection.
slotDescriptions.collapseIcon: The icon used to collapse the item.
slotDescriptions.content: The component that renders the content of the item. (e.g.: everything related to this item, not to its children).
slotDescriptions.dragAndDropOverlay: The component that renders the overlay when an item reordering is ongoing. Warning: This slot is only useful when using the RichTreeViewPro component.
slotDescriptions.endIcon: The icon displayed next to an end item.
slotDescriptions.expandIcon: The icon used to expand the item.
slotDescriptions.groupTransition: The component that renders the children of the item.
slotDescriptions.icon: The icon to display next to the tree item's label.
slotDescriptions.iconContainer: The component that renders the icon.
slotDescriptions.label: The component that renders the item label.
slotDescriptions.labelInput: The component that renders the input to edit the label when the item is editable and is currently being edited.
slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
